text: I think the best solution would be to poll the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/content-audit|Content Audit> API.  That should let you know about changes. We don’t have webhooks for this but you can accomplish the same thing
Thanks for the context. I've broadened my retry. logic a bit.

I’m attempting to access my product library folders from the API. Has anyone done this before? For example, I’d like to post products directly to a folder in my product library or retrieve products from a specific folder in my product library. I created a <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/POST-to-Product-Folders/m-p/394922|ticket> in the community forum if you prefer to answer there for public consumption. Cheers

Guys, any idea on Location redirection based on IP address in HubSpot?

We have a website with 8 languages for 8 countries (US, Denmark, Russia, etc.,)

By default, the website has to redirect based on GeoLocation.  Also, there should be an option to change to other languages based site too.

Thanks in advance,
